column4: Hey, anyone know of a way to remove a module completely from your kernel without having to recompile? I'm running 2.6.20-8-generic and want to remove fglrx. I tried with modprobe -r followed by rmmod but it didn't do the trick.
fglrx is not compiled inmto the kernel.. if rmmod dont remove it - its because its in use.
there is a FORCE option to rmmod i recall
it's not? you can't just say that and leave. damn
